title: Blackscreens and can't rejoin game
body: Randomly in a game my screen will turn black. League won't let me alt+tab out to look at anything else so I have to force quit it. Then I can't get back in! It just says "Game in progress", even if I quit the client and rejoin it won't let me reconnect.

replies.body: If this is happening during the match then you could be having driver or even hardware failure.  I suggest using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide, and going over each step to fix this up.  Hopefully, these instructions will resolve the issue and not something more serious.  Hope it helps!
My video drivers have had no problem with any other game, and this is a recent issue. There is no reconnect button to get in the game, even though on the old client there was one.
